pullRequest.title: [Issue 2566] Add deposit event validation
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Add validation to ensure that eth1 deposit events are ordered and contiguous:

Add validation to DepositsFromBlockEvent to make sure the deposit events included are contiguous (there are no gaps / missing deposits).
Add ValidatingEth1EventsPublisher which tracks the latest deposit index processed and ensure that the next deposit event received starts at the expected index
When replaying deposits in DepositStorage:

Make sure we start from the first deposit at index 0
Track the last deposit processed to ensure that no deposits are missed


Add a fatal log message if an unhandled InvalidDepositEventsException is caught.

Fixed Issue(s)
Part of #2566
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Move deposit sorting logic into DepositsFromBlockEvent
Validate that deposits are contiguous within DepositsFromBlockEvent
Move new deposits exception to exception package
Validate DepositsFromBlockEvent is contiguous with prior event
Log a console error if deposit retrieval fails
Rework error message, propagate deposit error up the stack
Set latest deposit processed from storage
Require stored deposits to start at index 0
Add some more tests, clean up

nodes.bodyText: I suspect this misses the case where we miss the very first deposit.  We won't have replayed anything from disk so the last deposit index will be unset and we should then expect the first deposit to have index 0.
Should we include the actual deposit index we got in the message?

commit.message: Feedback - validate deposits start from 0, more detailed error
Add some logs around deposit processing
